channel.title: One Minute Irish
channel.itunes:summary: Learn Irish with Eoin as he teaches you the basics of Irish, or Gaeilge. In this podcast you'll be learning just enough Irish to get by on a holiday or business trip to Ireland - and to impress Irish speakers everywhere! Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
channel.itunes:author: Radio Lingua Network
channel.description: Learn Irish with Eoin as he teaches you the basics of Irish, or Gaeilge. In this podcast you'll be learning just enough Irish to get by on a holiday or business trip to Ireland - and to impress Irish speakers everywhere! Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Irish in minutes with the Radio Lingua Network

item.title: Radio Lingua Network News: 26 September 2008
item.description: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners! By way of joining in this international celebration of languages and language-learning we're delighted to introduce eight new podcasts today. We're adding Catalan, Danish, French, Japanese, Mandarin and Romanian to our One Minute Languages series; we're introducing our first podcast for English learners - Write Back Soon will help learners master Phrasal Verbs; and we're finally announcing the long-awaited sequel to Coffee Break Spanish: it's Show Time!
item.content:encoded: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners! By way of joining in this international celebration of languages and language-learning we're delighted to introduce eight new podcasts today. We're adding Catalan, Danish, French, Japanese, Mandarin and Romanian to our One Minute Languages series; we're introducing our first podcast for English learners - Write Back Soon will help learners master Phrasal Verbs; and we're finally announcing the long-awaited sequel to Coffee Break Spanish: it's Show Time!
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners

item.title: Radio Lingua Network News: 5 September 2008
item.description: The latest news from Radio Lingua including details of Coffee Break Spanish arrangements, new podcasts launched this autumn and the Radio Lingua video contest in which you can win an iPod.
item.content:encoded: The latest news from Radio Lingua including details of Coffee Break Spanish arrangements, new podcasts launched this autumn and the Radio Lingua video contest in which you can win an iPod.
item.itunes:subtitle: The latest news from Radio Lingua

item.title: Happy St Patrick's day from One Minute Irish
item.description: A special edition with Eoin podcasting over the phone from Paris in which he'll teach you how to wish your Irish-speaking friends a Happy St Patrick's day - in Irish!
item.content:encoded: A special edition with Eoin podcasting over the phone from Paris in which he'll teach you how to wish your Irish-speaking friends a Happy St Patrick's day - in Irish!
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy St Patrick's day

item.title: Lesson 10 - One Minute Irish
item.description: In lesson 10, the final lesson of this series of One Minute Irish, you will learn some useful phrases in Irish like 'cheers', 'happy birthday', and 'I love you' in Irish. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com
item.content:encoded: In lesson 10, the final lesson of this series of One Minute Irish, you will learn some useful phrases in Irish like 'cheers', 'happy birthday', and 'I love you' in Irish. item.itunes:subtitle: Learn some useful phrases in Irish

item.title: Lesson 09 - One Minute Irish
item.description: In lesson 9 of One Minute Irish you will learn to ask people how they're feeling and to answer the question yourself. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.title: Lesson 08 - One Minute Irish

item.title: Can't wait to download weekly shows? Find out more by listening...
item.description: Find out how you can get the whole course now and benefit from the enhanced version of each podcast with synchronised flashcards and a lesson guide featuring all vocabulary and pronunciation tips. The premium version of this course is available now in our store at http://www.radiolingua.com/store/
item.content:encoded: Find out how you can get the whole course now and benefit from the enhanced version of each podcast with synchronised flashcards and a lesson guide featuring all vocabulary and pronunciation tips. item.itunes:subtitle: Get the complete One Minute Irish series now

item.title: Lesson 02 - One Minute Irish
item.description: In lesson 2 of One Minute Irish you will learn how to answer 'dia duit' when someone says it to you. You'll also learn how to say 'please' and 'thank you'. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

item.title: Promo - One Minute Irish
item.description: Welcome to One Minute Irish. in this podcast you'll be learning just enough Irish to get by on a holiday or business trip to Ireland, or just to impress your Irish-speaking friends. Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
